titles.title: A bill to amend section 794 of title 18, United States Code, to provide more severe penalties for certain forms of espionage.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to provide a mandatory life sentence (except when the death penalty is invoked) for any person convicted of gathering or delivering defense information to a foreign government.
